article.headline: Domino's Pizza to add 20,000 workers nationwide
article.body: Domino's Pizza Inc. DPZ, -2.50% said Monday that it will hire 20,000 new workers nationwide to fill positions including assistant manager, customer service representative and pizza maker. The pizza delivery chain continues to open new locations and existing stores are busy, the company said in a statement. Last month, Domino's reported earnings that blew past expectations. Domino's stock has gained nearly 36% for the year to date while the S&P 500 index SPX, +0.87% is up 4.4% for the period.
